column4: does anyone know whether you can use Sprint Wireless PCS on Linux?
hours if it is USB1.0, minutes if it is fast USB
thanks , I was starting to wonder

if you are curious, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USB. USB speeds are 1.5 Mbit/s, 12 Mbit/sec, or 480Mbit/sec. If any of the cables or hubs or anything in the system is not rated for the high speeds the drive will fall back to the slowest speed
so yeah it could be normal for copying 2 gigs to take hours
I'm guessing the cable is the issue here then
there is something  I need to account for,  because  2 gig at 15 mb/s should only take 2.5 minutes
the speeds are Mbits/sec, not Mbytes/sec (i.e., you are calculating a speed that is 8 times too fast)
pastebin your xorg.conf file so we can hve a look
sorry, I've never seen a xorg.conf file like that one, I wouldnT' even know where to start
its pretty big i know. probably the most relevant part is the Modes section where i put in the modeline for 1440x900. i'm not sure why it doesn't work, though :(
there is a #xorg maybe they know
